data.name: Paint Royale
data.detailed_description:
Paint Royale is a paintball shooter that goes in the direction of battle royale and co-op, in the different game modes you can have a lot of fun with your friends.

the game offers a large selection of weapons that can be adapted and modified according to your own wishes, the skill tree plays a major role in changing the element and the perks of a weapon. In addition, the skill tree offers you the opportunity to improve and restructure your skills.

The Paint Royale team is very keen to have a strong nd community that sticks together, we do a lot to give you what you want, this is shown by the mod support where new content can be added to the game, and every week becomes one community event take place where you can vote which community creations and ideas will be built into the game, every Saturday the result is evaluated and after a certain test period implemented in the game.

The maps in paint royale are also unique, both in their structure and in their abilities, so each map has certain spots in which other element abilities apply, these can be used to advantage certain factors apply, but be careful, every advantage can also have a disadvantage.

The game modes also deserve a special place in the game because the creative team at Paint Royale comes up with lots of ideas for more and more fun.

data.short_description: Paint Royale is a Paintball Co-op shooter in which you can play with your friends in many different game modes and maps, the game modes include the most famous game modes such as Battle Royale, but also completely new game directions.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Arabic, Russian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: AMD FX 8350 / Intel Core 2 Duo E8400
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics unit with 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 / Intel Core I7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics unit with 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
